ygData.subject: Re: Infiltration...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ugh.  It was me who said I saw the guy with the spyglasses.  His name was Salvador (i think), on Xegony.  He is a higher lvl gnome (above 40 i believe) but I
ygData.messageBody:
Ugh. It was me who said I saw the guy with the spyglasses. His name was
Salvador (i think), on Xegony. He is a higher lvl gnome (above 40 i
believe) but I don't know what guild he was in, you'll have to figure that
out yourself. I have for the most part quit EQ because of time, so I cannot
"infiltrate". Good luck.

Xalastile
lvl 22 magician
xegony


> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
> Fellow tinkerers,
> I have heard no word from our infiltrator, maybe he doesn't want to?
> If you aren't going to, Mr. Infiltrator, then please, tell me the name of
> the guild so I can do it. Yes, thats right, I elect myself to do it, why?
> Well for one thing I can get to a high level quickly. I can get a gnomish
> warrior to level 8 in about a day or so easy, so that way I wouldn't walk
up
> being level 1, and suspiciously ask to join. Also, I personnaly think I'm
> good at persuasion. (I mean, have any of you ever sold a book of Dischord
> for one plat before?) I would get in swiftly, then discreetly extract the
> information. I'd get it casually and without any suspicion. That is why I
> think having me to do it would be the best, and quickest way. Let's not
> waste hundereds of platinum pieces everyday, looking for a one in a
million
> formula!
> Come on, who's with me!?
>
> Sniffledoo Copperheart. Common Squire of The Scarlet Blade -- Veeshan
>
>
